body.name: TOSHIBA AC25CEW-SS Large 6-Slice Convection Toaster Oven Countertop, 10-In-One with Toast, Pizza and Rotisserie, 1500W, Stainless Steel, Includes 6 Accessories

features: 10-IN-ONE VERSATILITY - With 10 Functions, this All-in-One machine can take care of all your cooking needs. 10 Functions include: Toast, Bake, Broil, Pizza, Cookies, Defrost, Reheat, Rotisserie, Keep Warm, and Convection.ONE-YEAR LONG WARRANTY - 1-Year Warranty Plus a Lifetime of Customer Support. Any problems with your toaster oven will be solved professionallyHolds six slices of bread, or fits 12 inch pizza Convection fan for even and faster cooking

EASY TO USE - Control all the features and check current cooking settings quickly with three control knobs that have large High Contrast LCD Displays. Allowing you to get the desired cooking result every time

POWERFUL COOKING & ADJUSTABLE TEMPERATURE CONTROL – Our TOSHIBA Countertop Toaster Oven allows for a faster and even baking experience with its 1500W powerful output. It maintains a consistent temperature for up to two hours at a range between 150°F–450°F

XL FAMILY-SIZED CAPACITY - With a Larger interior, this oven can fit up to 6 slices of bread, a 11" pizza, casseroles, cookies, and up to a 4-pound chicken. External Dimensions are approximately 18. 98" X 15. 59" X 10. 78"
INCLUDING 6 ACCESSORIES - TOSHIBA Speedy Convection Toaster Oven comes with a removable crumb tray, rotisserie kit and lifter, baking rack, baking pan, and a rack clamp
ONE-YEAR LONG WARRANTY - 1-Year Warranty Plus a Lifetime of Customer Support. Any problems with your toaster oven will be solved professionally
body.description: This ten-function digital Toshiba toaster oven with convection has a six-slice capacity and features a stainless steel front that will compliment any kitchen. It's big enough to cook most family meals, including a roast chicken or 9x13 inch casserole. The large, backlit blue LED digital display menu is easy to read and lets you adjust cooking mode, time, and temperature; with a simple turn of the dial, the oven temperature can be set from 150 to 450 degrees for up to two hours. Upper and lower heating elements and a convection fan provide even cooking. The adjustable rack positions give flexibility to cook multiple types of food. A removable crumb tray simplifies cleaning. A baking pan and three-piece Rotisserie kit are included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love It - 2 Years & Still Loving It!
reviews.reviewText: I love this toaster oven! After more than 5 years of searching for a good quality toaster oven both in stores and online, and being continually disappointed by how tinny and cheaply made most of them seemed to be even at 3 times the cost of this Toshiba, I'd spotted this one on Amazon and decided in desperation to take a chance on it due to the many good reviews it already had. I've not regretted that impulse for as much as a moment, and have thoroughly enjoyed using this toaster oven.It looks great on my counter, is more sturdy than any toaster ovens I had looked at in stores for MANY years, and works great! Since I already had both a built-in Wolf convection wall oven and a built-in Wolf convection microwave oven, I hadn't cared whether the toaster oven had a convection feature or not, but am now glad it did, because I use that feature a great deal more often than I'd ever thought I would. As with most toaster ovens, the exterior of this one does get hot, but not frightenly so. I'd purchased a black silicone 9x12" mat from Amazon to place on the top of it to diffuse some of the heat from rising to the cabinets above, but mainly so I could place a couple of extra toaster oven pans on it when the oven was in use--when not in use, I store the clean nested pans in the toaster oven. (Amazon has some great options available for extra stainless steel toaster oven pans, and a 12x10x1" is a bit larger than the standard pans for this size toaster oven, but fits it perfectly.) I'd read one review by someone who'd returned their oven because the display sometimes fogged a little with steam when the convection feature was used. It does do that slightly, but the display remains clear enough to see even when it does, it also clears up again as soon as the oven cools, and has not negatively affected the operation of the oven whatsoever in the 2 years that I've been using mine. I truly love this toaster oven!This Toshiba actually surpasses the former great toaster oven it had taken me years to find this replacement for, since the design of it, especially the sturdy base of it, is far superior to the old one I'd had for more than 20 years. That one had been a quality toaster oven also, and had still been working like a champ, but it's one design flaw had been that one of the legs on it had broken, and I'd grown tired of crazy gluing it back on every few months or so, yet couldn't find any new ones in stores that had been nearly as good as my old one--until finding this Toshiba! This Toshiba actually exceeded my expectations in every way, and I have been delighted with it since the very moment of taking it out of the box, because the quality and design of it had not only surpassed the much favored old toaster oven I'd liked so well, but also the design and quality of the many, many others I had looked at in all sorts of stores over the years, too. I'd expected I'd likely have to resign myself to settling for a toaster oven somewhat inferior to the one I had enjoyed using for many years, so opening the box to discover that this Toshiba was vastly superior to any others I had seen was a nearly transcendent experience. If you've suffered through trying to replace any good quality small kitchen appliance in the past decade or so, you'll certainly understand what I mean. All too often one has to end up settling for appliances that are more cheaply made, cease to work after only a few months, or don't work at all right out of the box! I'll be keeping the Toshiba brand in mind when making any future purchases, because I could not have been more pleased with the purchase of this toaster oven!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Fabulous and I couldn't be happier!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is the quietest Convection Toaster Oven I've ever owned. The heat is distributed evenly and it cooks evenly when baking or toasting. This was a bit deeper than my old (large) Black and Decker oven which did not cook evenly and sounding like a mini helicopter while running. I am still amazed at the quietness of this oven. I hardly can tell that it's on when it's cooking, except for seeing great results. I love that this oven has a light in it as well. Easy to follow instruction booklet included, as is a drip tray, cooking tray, rotisserie tools and a handle to remove. I also love that it will cook 8 pieced of toast at a time. It is higher than my old oven and I'm looking forward to trying a rotisserie chicken one day soon. I couldn't be happier!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fairly well insulated.
reviews.reviewText: Sent back a Hamilton Beach oven because it was extremely hot on sides and top. This oven has better insulation. The heat distributes well, especially good for making toast. Best placement of rack is displayed on the door for different functions. The digital timer counts down, then turns itself off. Very accurate. Everything works great so far. My only complaint is that there is no manual on setting. If you want to preheat, for example, you have to set for "Toast" or some other setting. Then you have to select a temperature and watch for the right temperature before the time runs out. It would be better to add a "Preheat" option to the selections available.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use function, temperature and time controls. Even toasting through multiple bread types. Broiling and reheating are fine. I like this toaster oven because of it's simplicity and it's many ways to cook food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive, easy to use, great price. Very happy with this purchase.
reviews.reviewText: We wanted to replace our old Kitchen Aid toaster oven, which was attractive but we never really loved it. It was very inconsistent when toasting/baking and I didn't like the rack positioning and how the rack slid out too easily when you didn't want it to.I debated over what to get next, looking at several options and reading all the reviews. I settled on this Toshiba and have been very pleased with it. It's attractive and a great size. It's very versatile and even allows you to tell it how many pieces of bread you are toasting so everything is toasted evenly. It's big enough to toast 6 slices at once. The pizza option is great too. Our Kitchen Aid didn't have that. We have yet to try all the options (cookies, rotisserie). Since it's doing such a great job, I should take advantage of its other features!I like how it looks substantial and more like an appliance than a breadbox. The stainless steel ties in nicely with our other kitchen appliances and fixtures.They one thing I wish it had, that our Kitchen Aid toaster oven had, is a crumb tray you can pull straight out from the outside/front. You can remove the Toshiba's tray, but you have to reach inside to do so.Otherwise, I highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have cooked every day and even baked cookies and made corn bread. I'm impressed thus far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good enough to replace the oven
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. the place we were staying didn't have an oven. considering we've been needing one with precise temperature control and the ability to dehydrate, this one was an awesome option. it works great! the temperature control isn't perfect but it seems to work pretty well and we haven't had any issues thus far. the size is great. much bigger than your standard toaster oven. you can purchase additional racks as well. we've been very pleased with it and it's also super easy to clean!!

It took me a long time to decide to buy this model, because there are just so many to choose from. I am extremely pleased with how it has worked so far. The warming function is so helpful. I have baked and use the toaster. I was very pleased with how it toasted. And the amazing thing is, I thought it was broken at first because it’s so quiet! You literally cannot hear a thing while it’s working. Heats up fast cooks evenly and perfectly. No complaints at all.The only caveat I would add is to make sure that you’re not wanting to put your 12 inch pizza pan in to make pizza as it will not fit in this toaster oven. I looked at so many models and I think I was mistaken when I ordered this one thinking that it was large enough for a 12 inch pizza pan. We’ll just be making rectangles from now on.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente horno! Precio, calidad, funciones! Estoy muy contento, el mejor horno que he tenido
reviews.reviewText: Contras:- Un poco pequeño para poner un pollo de 5 libras. ( Bien amarrado podría quedar bien , pero uno más grande, no creo! rosaría con la parte de arriba y las resistencias ,por lo mismo se quemaría )- Se mancha muy fácil para parte interna de arriba, ( Tienes que voltear el horno y lavarlo con bicarbonato y limón ) y es una práctica un poco complicada, si no quieres que se quede sucio y con olores pasados .- No tiene conversión a grados centígrados, solo es FARENHEIT.- Faltaría reloj y quizás programar una hora para iniciar su funcionamiento.VENTAJAS:( Por qué sí, comprar este horno, tú lo decidirás )+ El mejor horno eléctrico que he tenido , y el primero de convección! Excelente producto sin duda.+ Un horno super eficiente, para calentar 6 rebanadas de pizza congelada en 8 min y con solo 400 grados F. Quedará, como recién hecha.+ Un pollo rostizado de 3 kilos, quedó en su punto y dorado en 55 min ( obviamente, hay que ir , practicando para que puedas calcular la potencia y tiempo y modo de cocción ) +++ Costillar de res 2 piezas de 30cm ( únicamente dejar marinar 3horas con hierbas de olor y sal de mar ) en 35 min doradas y te aseguro te vale la pena! ++++ La charola de moronas es un poco incómoda para sacarla y limpiarla, únicamente esperar a que se enfrie y como consejo, cuando la ingreses dejar de ser derecha, por qué si no... Quedará un poco de lado . Pero hasta atrás ajusta perfectamente.+ La cocción es increíble, la mitad de tiempo de cualquier horno convencional.( La opción de convección funciona excelente)+ Se calienta en la parte exterior obviamente y saca a veces un humo por la cocción, Así que es normal ( Pero , sin ningún problema )Finalmente, precio, calidad, funcionamiento, eficacia! Cumplen absolutamente las expectativas!Lo recomiendo al 100%P.d. no es un horno de microondas, es un horno donde puedes hacer papas fritas, casi sin aceite, pero puedes cocinar en la mitad de tiempo y quizás 1/3 de un horno convencional.

The oven is good, the design of the style is also very beautiful, personal feeling oven than air fryer to practical, the oven is fully functional, the color is super beautiful, convenient and hygienic at home, children eat also rest assured, want to buy the kiss can rest assured to buy! The white color is very beautiful, the capacity is quite enough for everyone to use, the key is that the price is cheap, received baked egg tarts, heating up can also be, looking forward to the later period of various pastry baked chicken wings are delicious cost-effective is very good value is very good, just baked out is very good, the capacity is also very large, like

reviews.reviewTitle: La preparación rápido y sus opciones son claras.
reviews.reviewText: Excelente horno, ya se prepararon/hornearon panqués individuales y quedaron deliciosos! Además para recalentar Pizzas y pan es muy práctico.Solo que la charola "Crumb Tray", para colectar migajas, está deforme o sea torcida...es normal?Debo pedir remplazo?

Works really well, heats up quickly and cleaning is easy. The bake function uses both top and bottom heating elements so you need to be careful when cooking more delicate items, I fount it will cook slightly faster than a conventional oven.What I don't like is the volume of the sound when you press a button or when the timer ends, it's really not discrete...
